attributes.action: Resolve the issue of theft from the public purse by MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know there are many petitions out there regarding this issue, but I feel that the wording is a bit woolly in some of them. Hence, Gordon Brown, as the unelected PM, must immediately stop MP's stealing money from the tax payer through the corrupt usage of allowances and expenses. All stolen monies to be repaid and the culprits dismissed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
